image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - Tinker for The Magical Dragon Machine Display at Cake International Birmingham NEC 2017
image:image.image:caption: Tinker - a 12" Victorian Child Figure, made with Modelling Paste, decorated with flower paste, cake lace and isomalt. The Magical Dragon Machine was created for a display at Cake International Birmingham NEC 2017, to support Coffee4Craig Charity. Photo taken by Roger Peaple Photography.

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - Tinker for The Magical Dragon Machine Display at Cake International Birmingham NEC 2017
image:image.image:caption: Tinker - a 12" Victorian Child Figure, made with Modelling Paste, decorated with flower paste, cake lace and isomalt. The Magical Dragon Machine was created for a display at Cake International Birmingham NEC 2017, to support Coffee4Craig Charity. Photo taken by Roger Peaple Photography.

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - Tinker and her tools
image:image.image:caption: 12" Victorian Child carrying her steampunk style tools to build the Magical Dragon Machine.

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - Victorian Lady on a swing
image:image.image:caption: 12" Victorian lady on a swing, made with Saracino modelling paste, decorated with gumpaste and royal icing, and her hair was made with corn silk. Last minute piece created for Cake International Birmingham NEC 2017. Silver Award.

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - Black Masquerade
image:image.image:caption: This collaboration piece was inspired by the Black Masquerade, one of the Divas illustrations created by the acclaimed and talented Fairy and Fantasy Artist: “Maxine Gadd”. This is a structured bust cover with homemade chocolate and sugar paste. For the decorations, I used gumpaste, sugarpaste, royal icing, isomalt and cake lace. Totally edible, with exception of the wired flowers. It was a real pleasure to take part in The Sugar Myths and Fantasies Global Edition collaboration alongside over 120 talented artists from all over the world!!

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - Black Masquerade
image:image.image:caption: Some extra photos of the Black Masquerade piece.

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - Steampunk Lady
image:image.image:caption: Decorative exhibit entered for Cake International Birmingham Competition 2016 - Awarded Gold. Steampunk lady structure bust, covered with homemade chocolate and sugar paste, decorated with modelling, sugar, and mexican paste, some royal icing, cake lace and isomalt.

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - Steampunk Lady
image:image.image:caption: Some extra photos of the Steampunk Lady piece.

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - Engagement Cake
image:image.image:caption: Celebration entry for Cake International Alexander Palace London, awarded Silver. 2 tier covered in sugarpaste, decorated with royal icing and some sugarpaste daises on a pastillage vase on top. The royal icing decorations include some lambeth technique, scrolls, and line and string work, with run-out designs.

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - Wedding Cake
image:image.image:caption: 3 tier Wedding Cake entry for Squires Kitchen Competition 2016. This is covered in sugarpaste and decorated with royal icing details including some lambeth technique, scrolls, line and run-out work and some pastillage for the gazebo. For the steainless steal windows effect, I used some piping gel around royal icing, modelling paste for the bride and groom owl models and gumpaste for the flowers inside of the pastillage vase, inside the gazebo. I was awarded a 'Commended" certificate for this cake.

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - Celebration Cake
image:image.image:caption: A single tier celebration cake entry for Cake International Excel London 2015. Cake covered in sugarpaste, decorated with royal icing, bridge and line work, a sugarpaste designed panel underneith, some deises and butterflies made with gumpaste and an abstract semi circle royal icing work on top of cake. I was awarded a Bronze certificate.

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - Old Hollywood Glamour Wedding Cake
image:image.image:caption: This was my entry for Squires Kitchen Competition 2015. 2 tier cake covered in sugarpaste and decorated with royal icing and some pastillage for the stairs, covered with gumpaste and decorated with royal icing. The couple on top is hand modelled with modelling paste, dressed with gumpaste and royal icing string work for the brides hair ornament. I was awarded First Price on this class with this cake!

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - Miniature Wedding Cake
image:image.image:caption: My entry for Squires Kitchen Competition 2015. 2 tier miniature cake (to fit within 6" square), covered in sugarpaste and decorated with royal icing, with some lambeth technique, bridge, line and string work, with 3 piped red roses. I was awarded a "Commended" certificate with this cake.

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - Celebration Cake
image:image.image:caption: This was my entry for Cake International Excel in London 2014. It was a celebration cake covered and decorated with royal icing. I decorated with oriental string work and place a pastillage mat and vase on top for with a pastillage vase and gumpaste daisies inside. I was awarded Gold and placed 2nd place for this class.

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - Wedding cake
image:image.image:caption: 3 tier Wedding Cake entry for Cake International Excel London 2014. Cake covered in sugarpaste, painted and airbrushed then decorated with some a huge gumpaste blue rose and petals falling from it. I was awarded a "Certificate of Merit".

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - Celebration Cake
image:image.image:caption: Celebration Cake entry for NSA (National Sugar Association) Competition 2014. This cake was covered and decorated with royal icing, including some lambeth technique and string, line and lace work, andpiped roses on top. I was awarded 2 Prize on this class.

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - The Queen's Wedding Cake
image:image.image:caption: Here you can see the replica of The Queen’s Wedding cake on the left and on the right the newly restored version created by various members of The British Sugarcraft Guild (including myself).

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - The Queen's Wedding Cake
image:image.image:caption: This is the award-winning Queen’s Wedding Cake Project that I have proudly taken part on with members of The British Sugarcraft Guild across the UK, and is displayed at The Peek Freans Museum in Bermondsey.

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - Calebs Courage for "Amore - a heart for children collaboration"
image:image.image:caption: This was my piece inspired by Caleb MacArthur’s story @CalebsCourage, a 3 year old boy who knew the true meaning of being a superhero.

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - Romeo and Juliet for Cake International Birmingham 2018
image:image.image:caption: This was my small decorative exhibit for the Cake International Birmingham 2018.

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - Bald Ballerina for "I Guerrieri Collaboration"
image:image.image:caption: This was my piece for “I Guerrieri” Collaboration, inspired by Maggie Kudirka, whom at the age of 23 and a dancer for the Joffrey Concert Group in NYC, in 2014, was diagnosed with metastatic (stage 4) breast cancer. After undergone chemotherapy and double mastectomy, she was back in the dance studio only 6 days after surgery. Maggie and her family set up a donation website to help with her mounting expenses, which she will need for the rest of her life or until a cure is found. She teaches Ballet master classes and shares her story to raise awareness and funds for breast cancer treatment and research.

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - World Water Day for "Amore - a future for our children" collaboration
image:image.image:caption: This was my piece created for the “Amore - a future for our children” collaboration, revealed on the World Water Day (22nd March ‘19).

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - Meditating Indian for "The Essense of India" Competition
image:image.image:caption: This was my piece for the Orpington branch table for the British Sugarcraft Guild Exhibition - Region 8 - in Brighton May’19.

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - Indian lady for "The Essence of India" Competition
image:image.image:caption: Another piece for the Essence of India Orpigton Branch Table, for the The British Sugarcraft Guild Region 8 Exhibition in Brighton May’19.

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - Brunette Burlesque Figure
image:image.image:caption: This is a Sugarjunkies collaboration to celebrate Brulesque. This piece was created using Saracino Pasta Model, Squires Royal Icing Mix Powder, Cake Lace, Global Sugar Artists Network Brushes, Sugarflair Colours and The Sugar Paste sugarpaste.

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - Brunette Burlesque Figure
image:image.image:caption: More photos of my Burlesque piece, created for The Burlesque Collaboration.

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - "Ursula" - piece created for the Sugar Witches Display
image:image.image:caption: “Ursula” was inspired on a post from the Dark Beauty magazine, from 12th October, 2015, photographer: Sandra Bluhm - Licht und Schattenspiel, model: Gatto Nero Katzenkunst. This piece was created using Saracino Pasta Model, Saracino Cioccolato Plastico Bianco, Saracino Colour Powder, Saracino Isomalt, Cake Lace, Global Sugar Artists Network brushes, Cerart and PME Tools. Hope you like her.

image:image.image:title: Competition and Collaboration Cakes - "Ursula" - my piece for the Sugar Witches Collaboration
image:image.image:caption: A better close up of "Ursula’s face”. She was on display at Cake International NEC Birmingham, 2019.

image:image.image:caption: Different angles of Ursula displayed at Cake International Birmingham, NEC, 2019.

image:image.image:title: Toppers - Grandpa's topper
image:image.image:caption: Mini figure of a grandpa, based on his photo and his surroundings. I used some RKT (Rice Krispies Treats) for his armchair and modelled his figure and little dog with modelling paste and printed his newspaper and rug on icing sugar sheets.

image:image.image:title: Competitions and Collaboration Pieces - Celebration Cake
image:image.image:caption: Celebration Cake entry for NSA (National Sugar Association) Competition 2014. This cake was covered and decorated with royal icing, including some lambeth technique and string, line and lace work, andpiped roses on top. I was awarded 2 Prize on this class.

image:image.image:title: Competitions and Collaboration Pieces - Wedding cake
image:image.image:caption: 3 tier Wedding Cake entry for Cake International Excel London 2014. Cake covered in sugarpaste, painted and airbrushed then decorated with some a huge gumpaste blue rose and petals falling from it. I was awarded a "Certificate of Merit".

image:image.image:title: Competitions and Collaboration Pieces - Celebration Cake
image:image.image:caption: This was my entry for Cake International Excel in London 2014. It was a celebration cake covered and decorated with royal icing. I decorated with oriental string work and place a pastillage mat and vase on top for with a pastillage vase and gumpaste daisies inside. I was awarded Gold and placed 2nd place for this class.

image:image.image:title: Competitions and Collaboration Pieces - Miniature Wedding Cake

I was awarded a "Commended" certificate with this cake.

image:image.image:title: Competitions and Collaboration Pieces - Old Hollywood Glamour Wedding Cake
image:image.image:caption: This was my entry for Squires Kitchen Competition 2015. 2 tier cake covered in sugarpaste and decorated with royal icing and some pastillage for the stairs, covered with gumpaste and decorated with royal icing. The couple on top is hand modelled with modelling paste, dressed with gumpaste and royal icing string work for the brides hair ornament. I was awarded First Price on this class with this cake!

Creative Cake decoration.

image:image.image:title: Celebration and Wedding Cakes - Royal iced white and gold cake
image:image.image:caption: Celebration cake covered and decorated with royal icing, with some lambeth technique, painted in gold.

image:image.image:title: Celebration and Wedding Cakes - Silhouette celebration cake
image:image.image:caption: 3 tier cake covered with sugarpaste and decorated with some black leaves cuttings.

image:image.image:title: Celebration and Wedding Cakes - 2 tier celebration cake

image:image.image:title: Celebration and Wedding Cakes - Cherry tree wedding cake
image:image.image:caption: 3 tier cake covered with sugarpaste, decorated with 2 chocolate sculpted trees, with some cherry blossoms all around it.

image:image.image:title: Celebration and Wedding Cakes - Black and white wedding cake
image:image.image:caption: 3 tier cake covered with sugarpaste and decorated with cake lace.

image:image.image:title: Celebration and Wedding Cakes - Madeira cake with vanilla butter frosting
image:image.image:caption: Madeira cake with vanilla butter frosting and raspberry jam.

image:image.image:title: Celebration and Wedding Cakes - Chocolate Genoese Sponge
image:image.image:caption: Chocolate genoese sponge with chocolate ganache filling.

image:image.image:title: Celebration and Wedding Cakes - Black Forest Cake
Celebration and Wedding Cakes - Sculpted sofa cake
Celebration and Wedding Cakes - Dolly, sculpted cake inspired by Carlos Lischetti's
image:image.image:caption: Carlos Lischetti created Monty, the sheepdog, and he inspired me on creating Dolly.

image:image.image:title: Celebration and Wedding Cakes - Royal iced inspired by porcelain design
Celebration and Wedding Cakes - Pegasus sculpture
image:image.image:caption: Structure sculpture of a Pegasus made with RKT (Rice Krispies Treats) covered with sugarpaste and some gumpaste for the details.

image:image.image:title: Celebration and Wedding Cakes - Art Nouveau (Mucha) painting
image:image.image:caption: An 11" x 11" sugarpasted board painted with edible colour paste and colour dust mixed with a little of lemon extract for special effects, inspired on Feder artwork by Alphonse Mucha.

image:image.image:title: Celebration and Wedding Cakes - Christmas cake with poinsettia Topper
image:image.image:caption: Fruit cake covered with Marzipan and sugarpaste decorated with a gumpaste poinsettia.

image:image.image:title: Celebration and Wedding Cakes - Present Cake
image:image.image:caption: Chocolate sponge with chocolate buttercream, covered with sugarpaste, decorated with sugarpaste and gumpaste for the bow.

image:image.image:title: Celebration and Wedding Cakes - Castle Cake
image:image.image:caption: Chocolate sponge with white chocolate buttercream, covered with sugarpaste decorated with sugarpaste, royal icing(vine trees, details at doors and grass), pastillage (for the towers) and rice paper for the flags.

image:image.image:title: Celebration and Wedding Cakes - Sculpted Pony
image:image.image:caption: Fruit cake covered with sugarpaste with a sculpted pony made with RKT (Rice Krispies Treats) covered and modelled with sugarpaste.

image:image.image:title: Celebration and Wedding Cakes - Under the sea cake
image:image.image:caption: Gluten free cake covered with sugarpaste and decorated with some under the sea creatures, all created with my own templates and a 2d dolphin on top, made with modelling paste.

image:image.image:title: Celebration and Wedding Cakes - Royal Icing cake e pastillage and isomalt
image:image.image:caption: 2 tier fruit cake covered with royal icing, decorated wiht oriental string work, some blossoms made of gumpaste, and a pastillage decoration with some isomalt on top.

image:image.image:title: Celebration and Wedding Cakes - Gardener boots Cake
image:image.image:caption: Lemon Sponge Cake with lemon curd filling, covered with sugarpaste, decorated with 2 boots made with modelling paste and some mud impressions of dirty boots painted around the cake.

image:image.image:title: Celebration and Wedding Cakes - Guinea Pig and Nurse's Hat Cake
image:image.image:caption: Lemon sponge cake with lemon curd filling, covered with sugarpaste and decorated with hand modelled hat and guinea pig made with modelling paste and some RKT(Rice Krispies Treats) for the hat.

image:image.image:title: Celebration and Wedding Cakes - Mockingjay Badge from the Hunger Games Film
image:image.image:caption: Chocolate cake covered with sugarpaste, decorated with a sculpted 2d Mockingjay Badge from the Hunger Games Film, made with gumpaste and pastillage and painted in gold.

image:image.image:title: Celebration and Wedding Cakes - Royal Iced Cake with strings work
image:image.image:caption: Sponge cake covered and decorated with royal icing.

image:image.image:title: Celebration and Wedding Cakes - Homemade Chocolate Easter Eggs
image:image.image:caption: I made 2 big Chocolate Easter Eggs and filled them in with small also homemade Easter Eggs and modelled a little Easter bunny with carrots and mini Easter eggs for Easter decorations.

image:image.image:title: Celebration and Wedding Cakes - Rugby player birthday cake
image:image.image:caption: Chocolate sponge cake with chocolate buttercream and raspberry jam covered with sugarpaste and chocolate gateau around it and a modelled rugby player on top, and rice paper flag.

image:image.image:title: Cake Toppers - Tropical Flowers Bouquet
image:image.image:caption: Cake topper created for a Jamaican designed cake. Used Squires Flower Paste, PME cutters and Sugarflair Dust Colours.

image:image.image:title: Cake Toppers - Stained Glass Effect using Piping Gel
image:image.image:caption: Topper created for demonstrations.

image:image.image:title: Cake Toppers - Meditating Ladies
image:image.image:caption: 6” Indian figures wearing a sari, created for demonstrations and workshops.

image:image.image:title: Cake Toppers - 7" Blossom Girl figure
image:image.image:caption: Small Figure created for a workshop.

image:image.image:title: Cake Toppers - Santa Claus Topper
image:image.image:caption: Small Santa Claus topper created for family Christmas Cake.

image:image.image:title: Cake Toppers - 12" Lady topper
image:image.image:caption: 12" topper figure made with Saracino modelling paste, Satin Ice gum paste, Cake Lace, Rainbow Dust Colours, Innovative Sugarworks and PME tools.

image:image.image:title: Cake Toppers - Super Mario and Princess Peach Topper
image:image.image:caption: Wedding Couple topper.

image:image.image:title: Cake Toppers - 2d Aquarius Zodiac Sign Topper
image:image.image:caption: Topper created for the West Wickham Sugarcraft Club, table display for the National SugarArt Association, which with many other members club team pieces, got us 1st prize in 2014.

image:image.image:title: Cake Toppers - Little Snoopy topper
image:image.image:caption: Snoopy sleeping on top of his dog house

image:image.image:title: Cake Toppers - Cake Angel Christmas toppers
image:image.image:caption: I have modelled my logo for Christmas and added a little Christmas tree to place on top of our family Christmas cake.

Cake Toppers - Grandpa's topper
image:image.image:caption: Mini figure of a grandpa, based on his photo and his surroundings. I used some RKT (Rice Krispies Treats) for his armchair and modelled his figure and little dog with modelling paste and printed his newspaper and rug on icing sugar sheets.

image:image.image:title: Cake Toppers - Airbrushed cupcakes
image:image.image:caption: 20 different stencil designs for cupcakes. All covered with sugarpaste and airbrushed.

image:image.image:title: Cake Toppers - Christian Louboutin Pastillage Shoe Topper
